official_title: To establish an alternative penalty for operation of certain vessels in the coastwise trade between the United States and Puerto Rico.

summary.text: Authorizes certain vessels to engage in the coastwise trade between the United States and Puerto Rico upon payment of a specified penalty to the Secretary of Transportation.

titles.title: To establish an alternative penalty for operation of certain vessels in the coastwise trade between the United States and Puerto Rico.
